## Welcome

This site has been created by the [Bioinformatics Team (BIT)](https://www.carrerasresearch.org/es/unidad-de-bioinform%C3%A1tica_130420) unit a the [Josep Carreras Leukaemia Research Institute (IJC)](https://www.carrerasresearch.org/en) to store materials and links for workshops we are hosting during the year 2022-2023. We encourage you to add any comments or thoughts you may have!

General topics

* R and R packages
* Bioconductor
* Linux and beyond
* High performance computing (HPC)
* Data management
* Tools for reproducible research


If you are interested in any particular topic for a future workshop, please let us know by sending us a mail or simply passing by our office.
